name: Bread of the Dead
description:
In this Dia de Los Muertos-inspired gardening game,  raise skeleton bakers to make bread! Sell that bread to buy soul seeds and decorations for the area! Plant those seeds to grow more skeletons!

Controls:

WASD to move
E to interact

Credits:

Alex Hanlin- Programmer

Noah Kuhn- Programmer, Sound Designer

Karina Arellano- Artist, Sound Designer

Dariela Hernandez- Artist
